message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. I think this is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me in the middle?
